channel.title: Server changes, potential plugin
channel.description:
What if we installed a plugin like this: http://forums.bukkit.org/threads/sec-mech-econ-residence-v2-2-self-serve-area-protection-system-buy-sell-land-economy-860.9358/
Which would probably be configured as follows: Each person would be able to protect 1, maybe 2 areas. They would be allowed to allow certain people to build or disallow building, which would stop greifing all together. Anyone would be allowed to walk anywhere, no restrictions on movement. No one would be able to teleport to their residence.
Each user would also be required to renew the 'lease' on their area every X days, so if a user quits the server, his land becomes free again.
This would stop once and for all all 'land' disputes, and should stop greifing all together too. We might even be able to get rid of Big Brother, and we would be able to get rid of LWC, as you can hide your chests anywhere and not allow strangers to break blocks to get to them.
What do you think?

item.title: Server changes, potential plugin
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

[quote=“mironic, post:118, topic:399437”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=496568.msg3649511#msg3649511 date=1309634834]

[quote author=reyx7 link=topic=496568.msg3646326#msg3646326 date=1309397388]

I don’t know, probably this weekend.
[/quote]Don’t bother this plugin will just mean people getting in the way of my minecart tunnels and land stealing. Just add unlimited locks and find a big brother upgrade to completely remove environmental damage or make one, it is open source I believe. After that all problems solved nothing to worry about.

Unlimited locks + big brother + fire/lava damage off = all problems solved.
[/quote]+ PvP off

You’ll never be able to make everyone happy either way

PVP toggleable.

when someone has PVP on they can attack other people with PVP on…
When soneone has PVP off they cannot attack anyone and no one can attack them.

a 10 minute cooldown for this option.
EVERYONE is happy.[/quote]

10 minutes is too soon, it should be like a 24 hour thing so you cant change on a dime

Read full topic

item.title: Server changes, potential plugin
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

How about Pvp in non fucking protection areas. Problem solved. If you’re smart, you’ll have trees farms in your city, farms, etc. If you’re not, you’re going to get your ass killed. Basically, this plugin is going to make people a shitload more conscious in the wilderness.

Read full topic
